summary: Website project for an AI chatbot ("Abdl Chat Bot") requested to support explicit sexual/fetish (ABDL/diaper/urination/defecation) content; this scope is policy-restricted and should be treated as blocked/unsafe. User also shared an OpenAI API key publicly (security risk).
architectural_notes: Do not implement explicit sexual/fetish content features; require safety/compliance constraints for chatbot behavior.
Treat any user-shared API keys as compromised; require secure secret storage (server-side env vars) and never expose keys client-side.
known_issues: User posted an OpenAI API key in chat; key must be rotated/revoked and replaced with a securely stored secret.

existing_features.title: Build a basic chatbot web UI branded as “Abdl Chat Bot” that supports a standard PG-13 conversation experience (no explicit sexual content). The chat UI must include: a message list (user/assistant styling), a text input, send button, loading state, and error state.

Add a simple “Safety & Usage” disclosure in the UI stating that the chatbot does not provide explicit sexual content and may refuse certain requests, and provide a visible “Clear chat” action that resets the current conversation in the UI.

Do not use or store any user-provided OpenAI API key. Add a developer-facing note in the repo (e.g., in a visible frontend screen or a documentation page in-app) warning that the posted key is compromised and must be revoked/rotated, and that secrets must never be pasted into chat or committed to the codebase.
Establish a coherent visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, and layout) and apply it consistently across the chat screen. Do not use a blue/purple primary palette.
Generate and include a simple brand asset set as static images, and render them in the UI: an app logo and an assistant avatar.
Add Internet Identity login/logout UI so users can "login/signup" and the app clearly reflects whether the user is authenticated.
Implement chat history tabs/list UI (similar to ChatGPT) that allows switching between multiple past conversations for the current user.
Add automatic saving and restoring of chats so conversation state persists across refresh and can be restored later, with behavior dependent on authentication state.
Refactor the existing single-chat in-memory state in the main chat screen to support multi-chat selection and persistence while keeping existing Safety & Usage and Developer Safety Note UI intact.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website with an AI chatbot called "Abdl Chat Bot" (requested explicit adult/fetish content capabilities)

Implement a backend chatbot reply endpoint that returns safe, non-explicit responses. The backend must refuse or redirect requests for explicit sexual content, fetish content, or non-consensual content, and must respond with a clear refusal message in English when such content is requested.
Add tabs/list UI for past chats (chat history) so users can switch between previous conversations
Add login/signup (user authentication) to allow user-specific access to saved chats
Auto-save chats so conversation state persists (including across refresh) and can be restored later
Extend the Motoko backend to support per-user chat persistence needed for chat history: create/list/get/update/delete chats, scoped to the authenticated caller principal.
